application.doc: Renew an authorization server instance management certificate

method.name: PUT
method.id: Renew Authz Server Instance Management Certificate
method.doc: To renew the certificate which is used by an authorization server instance when communicating with the Verify Access policy server, issue an HTTP POST command on the authorization server resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: admin_id
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator name

param.name: admin_pwd
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator password

param.name: operation
param.doc: A flag that is used to indicate the operation to perform. This value is set to "renew" for the renew operation

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
